forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco awakens with a gentle, filtering light, hinting at the promise of a mild day ahead. The forecast offers much to appreciate: a mostly sunny tableau with high temperatures wrapping themselves around 66 degrees, softly dipping to 64 in the afternoon—a prelude to the gradual embrace of evening. Winds from the west southwest tease the air at a brisk pace, invigorating the spirit but not overwhelming the senses. This delicate breeze, gusting just enough to ruffle a sleeve, seems to whisper secrets from the bay, inviting one to explore the vibrant city.

However, as the sun strides higher, it will contend with a gathering layer of clouds, transforming by tonight into a mostly cloudy sky, under which temperatures will settle into the comfortable 57-degree range. The presence of fog is not overt this morning; the city stands clear, though hints of the marine layer linger, caressing the outskirts and hinting at a more enigmatic presence in the distance. For those planning to venture out, light layers are advisable; a comfortable sweater or jacket can shield against the chill that may come with the evening's embrace. One might find joy in a leisurely stroll, perhaps perusing local cafés, soaking in the sights of the bustling streets, or indulging in a quiet hour at the park—the day holds promise for simple yet fulfilling moments.
